alert.note: Alert for Jasper (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 10:25PM CDT until May 04 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jasper County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1025 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Carl Junction, or near Joplin, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Joplin... Carthage... Webb City... Carl Junction... Oronogo... Carterville... Duquesne... Jasper... Airport Drive... Alba... Purcell... Carytown... Asbury... Neck City... Avilla... Brooklyn Heights... Waco... Atlas... Dudenville... Oakland Park... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 38 and 56. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
